articles.title: Oil Prices Make U-Turn And Fall To $115 A Barrel, After Rising Near $120 - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Oil prices make an U-turn and fall To about $115 A Barrel, as European Union (EU) members disagreed on a potential oil embargo on Russia, but supply concerns limited the decline.

articles.title: Oil prices jump again as EU considers Russian oil ban - The Star Online
articles.description: Oil prices jumped more than US$3 on Monday, with Brent crude climbing above US$111 a barrel, as European Union nations considered joining the United States in a Russian oil embargo and after a weekend attack on Saudi oil facilities.
